## Feature Summary
A brief description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem/Use Case
What problem does this feature solve? What use case does it address?

## Proposed Solution
Describe your proposed solution in detail.

## Alternative Solutions
Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Additional Context
Add any other context, screenshots, or examples that might help illustrate the feature.

## Implementation Notes
If you have thoughts on how this could be implemented, feel free to share them.
